steps.content: Can you find a recipe for vegan lasagna and generate an image of how it should look?

Can you also give me tips on how to make it more flavorful?

Tips include adding nutritional yeast, using fresh herbs, and incorporating roasted vegetables for depth of flavor.

Vegan lasagna recipe includes zucchini, spinach, tofu, marinara sauce, and lasagna noodles. Image of vegan lasagna generated. For more flavor, add nutritional yeast, use fresh herbs, and incorporate roasted vegetables.
